page.title: 05SOCIAL CONCERN-SUTTON IN A.
page.content: {Health and welfare.Offical services. Home help,Meals on wheels,Community day centres for elderly and disabled. Probation and counselling services. King's Mill Hospital,general maternity and mental health depts.. Health Centre(New St.), G.P. and school health care. {Voluntary Services.}Age Concern,Oxfam, Gingerbread,Samaritans. {Leisure Facilities.}Two swimming pools Leisure Centre at Sutton Centre School. {Adult Education.}Sutton Centre Community School, Quarrydale and Ashfield Comprehensive Schools. JANET POWELL.
